name: CyberWrapZØne
description:
How to play:

Aim with your mouse (or right stick), then left click (or RT) to throw the bomb. This bomb will stick to whatever it touches and suck anything that is nearby.
Move with the left/right arrow (or a/d, or left stick).
You can double triple jump by pressing the up arrow key (or w, or LT) 3 times.

The objective of the game is to use the bombs at your disposal to eliminate all the enemies before you run out of time.

Credits:

Nielisson, 8Bitsstudio, Shivraj K- Art
85T, Ajoy - Programming
EmmanuelPCP - Sound Design

Theme : Void Sandwich - Stick Justice

Achievement : Mozart - make your own music

Tips :

The enemy always walk as long there is ground.
If it can jump on another ground, it does, else it goes back.
If it sees a bomb, it goes back.
If it sees the player, it shots in his direction and goes to him as he sees him.

-> There are only 5 levels, will you reach the end
